column1: #Text=Shaman says : " We 've been raising this herd of air bison since the Hundred Year War .
#Text=I wonder how long I 've been away .
#Text=" Shaman says : " That I can not say , but you do not have much time left .
#Text=The Harmonic Convergence is only weeks away .
#Text=" Korra says : " I have to close the spirit portal before that happens .
